direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods fetch account-related status information.
Both methods involve fetching status information but for different scopes (account vs. system).
Both methods access account-related data and may involve similar authentication mechanisms.

enhanced_by.reason: Initialization of the request handler is required before making any API requests.
Environment setup is often required before making API requests to ensure proper configuration.
Both methods involve verifying API responses and handling potential exceptions.
